title: RACE TRACK overview page Â» Preview IMAGES
user_story:
As a visitor
I want to see a preview image for each RACE TRACK on the overview page
So I can quickly find a specific one without knowing its name
description:
* each RACE TRACK item on the RACE TRACK overview page contains a preview image
* the 'preview image' refers to what is known as 'prime image' in the API
* the preview image is displayed in thumbnail size
* when a RACE TRACK has no prime image then the preview image shows the default fallback image
